alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; La Crosse; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 25 at 11:48AM CDT until March 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...La Crosse, Vernon, Crawford, Richland and Grant Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will develop this afternoon. Brief, locally stronger wind gusts may accompany the more intense bursts of snow, leading to sudden, significant visibility reductions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Grant; La Crosse; Richland; Vernon
